params._allowance: is the approved amount of tokens
params._expiryTime: is the time until which the transfer is allowed
params._from: is the address from which transfers are approved
params._to: is the address to which transfers are approved

params._allowances: is the array of approved amounts
params._descriptions: is the description array for these manual approvals
params._expiryTimes: is the array of the times until which eath transfer is allowed
params._from: is the address array from which transfers are approved
params._to: is the address array to which transfers are approved

params._amount: The amount of tokens to transfer

params._user: Address of the holder corresponds to whom list of manual approvals need to return

getActiveApprovalsToUser(address).return: address[] addresses fromaddress[] addresses touint256[] allowances provided to the approvalsuint256[] expiry times provided to the approvalsbytes32[] descriptions provided to the approvals

getAllApprovals().return: address[] addresses fromaddress[] addresses touint256[] allowances provided to the approvalsuint256[] expiry times provided to the approvalsbytes32[] descriptions provided to the approvals

getApprovalDetails(address,address).return: uint256 expiryTime of the approvaluint256 allowance provided to the approvaluint256 Description provided to the approval

getTokensByPartition(bytes32,address,uin.details: returning the balance of token holder against the UNLOCKED partition.  This condition is valid only when the base contract doesn't implement the `getTokensByPartition()` function.

params._expiryTime: is the time until which the transfer is allowed
params._from: is the address from which transfers are approved
params._increase: tells whether the allowances will be increased (true) or decreased (false). or any value when there is no change in allowances
params._to: is the address to which transfers are approved

params._changeInAllowance: is the array of change in allowances
params._descriptions: is the description array for these manual approvals
params._expiryTimes: is the array of the times until which eath transfer is allowed
params._from: is the address array from which transfers are approved
params._increase: Array of bools that tells whether the allowances will be increased (true) or decreased (false). or any value when there is no change in allowances
params._to: is the address array to which transfers are approved

reclaimERC20(address).details: We duplicate here due to the overriden owner & onlyOwner

params._tokenContract: The address of the token contract

reclaimETH().details: We duplicate here due to the overriden owner & onlyOwner

params._from: is the address from which transfers are approved
params._to: is the address to which transfers are approved

params._from: is the address array from which transfers are approved
params._to: is the address array to which transfers are approved

params._amount: The amount of tokens to transfer

devdoc.title: Transfer Manager module for manually approving transactions between accounts

addManualApproval(address,address,uint25.notice: Adds a pair of addresses to manual approvals

addManualApprovalMulti(address[],address.notice: Adds mutiple manual approvals in batch

executeTransfer(address,address,uint256,.notice: Used to verify the transfer transaction and allow a manually approved transqaction to bypass other restrictions

getActiveApprovalsToUser(address).notice: Returns the all active approvals corresponds to an address

getAllApprovals().notice: Get the details of all approvals

getApprovalDetails(address,address).notice: Get the details of the approval corresponds to _from & _to addresses

getDataStore().notice: used to return the data store address of securityToken

getInitFunction().notice: This function returns the signature of configure function

getPermissions().notice: Returns the permissions flag that are associated with ManualApproval transfer manager

getTokensByPartition(bytes32,address,uin.notice: return the amount of tokens for a given user as per the partition

getTotalApprovalsLength().notice: Returns the current number of active approvals

modifyManualApprovalMulti(address[],addr.notice: Adds mutiple manual approvals in batch

revokeManualApproval(address,address).notice: Removes a pairs of addresses from manual approvals

revokeManualApprovalMulti(address[],addr.notice: Removes mutiple pairs of addresses from manual approvals

verifyTransfer(address,address,uint256,b.notice: Used to verify the transfer transaction and allow a manually approved transqaction to bypass other restrictions
